unnormalised: Campus hiring remains a vital talent acquisition strategy, especially for fresh perspectives. NIT Trichy and IIT Madras consistently provide excellent candidates. We've observed positive results from our 2023 drive. The onboarding experience, offering comprehensive training in our Bangalore office (1000 sq ft), is crucial. Dr. Sharma's insights into optimizing candidate selection are valuable. Budget allocation of Rs. 5 Lakh for this year's initiative seems appropriate. We aim for a higher conversion rate than last year. Further data analysis is necessary. Let's strategize post-Diwali.
normalised: Campus hiring remains a vital talent acquisition strategy, especially for fresh perspectives. N I T Trichy and I I T Madras consistently provide excellent candidates. We've observed positive results from our two thousand and twenty three drive. The onboarding experience, offering comprehensive training in our Bangalore office (one thousand square feet), is crucial. Doctor Sharma's insights into optimizing candidate selection are valuable. Budget allocation of rupee five lakh for this year's initiative seems appropriate. We aim for a higher conversion rate than last year. Further data analysis is necessary. Let's strategize post-Diwali.
